BUY.description: Buy a piece of ship equipment

EQUIPMENT_NO_COMPATIBLE_SLOT.description: Message given when the second-hand equipment is not compatible with the ship slots.
EQUIPMENT_NO_COMPATIBLE_SLOT.message: Ova oprema nije kompatibilna s vašim brodom.

EQUIPMENT_NO_FREE_SLOT.description: Message shown by second-hand market if the ship does not have a free slot for the equipment.
EQUIPMENT_NO_FREE_SLOT.message: Vaš brod nema slobodnog mjesta za ovu opremu.

EQUIPMENT_NO_SPACE.description: Message shown by second-hand market if the equipment requires a free slot or free capacity to fit
EQUIPMENT_NO_SPACE.message: Vaš brod nema dovoljno slobodnog prostora za ovu opremu.

EQUIPMENT_SLOT_NO_SPACE.description: Message given when the ship has a compatible slot, but not enough space left to fit the equipment item.
EQUIPMENT_SLOT_NO_SPACE.message: Vaš brod ima kompatibilno mjesto, ali nema dovoljno prostora za instalaciju ove opreme.

FITTING_IS_INCLUDED_IN_THE_PRICE.description: Regarding installing a component on the ship

FLAVOUR_0_BODY.message: Bok! Zovem se {name} i prodajem svoju {equipment} iz svoje stare zahrđale kante. Želim {price} za nju.

FLAVOUR_1_BODY.message: Bok! Zovem se {name}. Imam gotovo novu {equipment} koju prodajem za samo {price}.

FLAVOUR_2_BODY.message: Pozdrav! Ja sam {name} i imam vrlo dobru {opremu} koja bi mogla biti vaša za samo {price}.

FLAVOUR_3_BODY.message: Pozdrav! Imam dodatnu {opremu} koje se moram riješiti, moja tražena cijena je {price}.

FLAVOUR_4_BODY.message: Pozdrav! Imamo dodatnu {opremu} koja bi mogla biti vaša za {cijena}.

FLAVOUR_4_TEXT.message: Prodaje se: preostala {oprema}, u dobrom stanju.

FLAVOUR_5_BODY.message: Pozdrav! Želite li kupiti moju staru {opremu}? Dobro mi je služila, ali sada sam je nadogradio i ne treba mi. Cijena je {price}.

FLAVOUR_5_TEXT.message: U ponudi: stara {oprema}, u ispravnom stanju.

HOW_DO_I_FITT_IT.description: Regarding installing a component on the ship

NOT_ENOUGH_MONEY_0.description: When the player doesn't have enough money to afford the item.
NOT_ENOUGH_MONEY_0.message: Nemaš dovoljno novca da si ovo priuštiš.

NOT_ENOUGH_MONEY_1.description: When the player doesn't have enough money to afford the item.
NOT_ENOUGH_MONEY_1.message: Vrati se kad budeš imao dovoljno novca.

NOT_ENOUGH_MONEY_2.description: When the player doesn't have enough money to afford the item.
NOT_ENOUGH_MONEY_2.message: Nisam dobrotvorna organizacija, vratite se kad si ovo budete mogli priuštiti.

NOT_ENOUGH_MONEY_3.description: When the player doesn't have enough money to afford the item.
NOT_ENOUGH_MONEY_3.message: Može se koristiti, ali cijena nije predmet pregovora.

NO_LONGER_AVAILABLE_0.description: If the sentence is hard to translate, just make up an excuse why the item is no longer available.
NO_LONGER_AVAILABLE_0.message: Žao mi je, upravo je prodano!

NO_LONGER_AVAILABLE_1.description: If the sentence is hard to translate, just make up an excuse why the item is no longer available.
NO_LONGER_AVAILABLE_1.message: Čini se da ga je moj kolega upravo prodao drugom kupcu. Žao mi je!

NO_LONGER_AVAILABLE_2.description: If the sentence is hard to translate, just make up an excuse why the item is no longer available.
NO_LONGER_AVAILABLE_2.message: Predomislio sam se, više nije na prodaju.
